QuestData.Title: The Garden of Night
QuestData.Description:
That should take care of things out here. Now we must tend to the inner garden. Once we're done, I'll sort out my recalcitrant husband.
Hopefully, any remaining spriggans will have cleared out on their own after hearing us dispatch the others.
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay spriggans in the central garden.
QuestData.RewardText:
I should have never left! He's told me time and again that I should face my...
Never mind. I can deal with that later.
The situation would have been much more dire if the two of you were not here.
